text: @realDonaldTrump @CNN I know you see this. We know you want our support! Do something about torture 6/1 of 25,000 dogs in China! Make the call to Xi Jinping! .@nytimes .@NYGovCuomo #XiJinping .@EndYulinCruelty .@PDChina .@JackMa .@NDogsLB #COVID19 #NursesCOVID19
